name: Billy Franklin's Adventure
description:
Description

Billy Franklin’s Adventure is a 2D puzzle Side Scroller starring Billy Franklin, the young son of famous inventor and American Founding Father Benjamin Franklin. The year is 1752 and Darkness has fallen upon the great city of Philadelphia. Ghosts descend in the night, tormenting the population. On the Hills outside of town, Ben Franklin seeks a solution, and he finds it in the sky. He Intends to harness the power of lightning to light up the town and keep the ghosts at bay.

However in his attempt to harness the power he is incapacitated. His son and lab assistant Billy takes his fathers device and heads for town to find a Doctor, and use the lightning as his father would have to save the city. He'll need to solve puzzles, using his knowledge of electricity and conduction to do so.
